dimensions.label: Approach to Technology
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with emerging tech?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly explore and adopt new technologies, often taking risks to stay ahead.
Your FarTwin will approach new tech with skepticism, weighing the benefits and drawbacks before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Interpersonal Relationships
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin build and maintain social connections?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize building strong, personal relationships based on trust and empathy.
Your FarTwin will focus on establishing functional, efficient connections with others, prioritizing productivity over emotional depth.

dimensions.label: Innovation Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin generate new ideas?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and creative instincts to come up with innovative solutions.
Your FarTwin will approach innovation through systematic analysis and data-driven decision making.

dimensions.label: Data Driven Decision Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on empirical evidence and data to inform every decision.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and experience when making decisions, even in the absence of concrete data.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin acquire new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will engage deeply with educational materials, such as videos or interactive simulations.
Your FarTwin will approach learning through traditional methods, such as reading and taking notes.

dimensions.label: Perception of Self
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin perceive their own identity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will have a strong sense of self and confidence in their abilities.
Your FarTwin will be more introspective and sensitive, acknowledging areas where they may be less confident.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will bring energy and enthusiasm to their creative pursuits, often taking risks.
Your FarTwin will approach creativity with attention to detail and precision.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be assertive and direct in their collaboration, pushing boundaries when necessary.
Your FarTwin will prioritize teamwork and mutual support, seeking to build strong relationships with colleagues.
